statements: UPDATE fashion_events SET location='Paris', event_date='2023-09-15' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE fashion_events SET guest_list='Celebrities, Influencers', location='New York' WHERE event_id=2;
UPDATE fashion_events SET location = 'Paris', event_date = '2023-09-15' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE fashion_events SET guest_list = 'John Doe, Jane Smith, Mary Johnson', runway_looks = '{"designer": "Chanel", "theme": "Spring Collection"}' WHERE event_name = 'Fashion Gala';
UPDATE fashion_show_schedule SET show_name = 'New York Fashion Week', show_location = 'New York City' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE guest_list SET guest_email = 'john.doe@example.com', guest_name = 'John Doe' WHERE guest_id = 2;
UPDATE fashion_show_schedule SET show_name = 'Spring Collection', show_location = 'New York Fashion Week' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE guest_list SET guest_email = 'example@example.com' WHERE guest_id = 1;
UPDATE fashion_show_schedule SET venue='Central Hall' WHERE show_id=1;
UPDATE guest_list SET guest_category='VIP' WHERE guest_id=5;
UPDATE fashion_show_schedule SET venue = 'New York City', event_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE guest_list SET guest_category = 'VIP' WHERE show_id = 1 AND guest_id = 5;
UPDATE fashion_show_schedule SET show_location = 'New York' WHERE show_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE guest_list SET guest_email = 'newemail@example.com', guest_type = 'VIP' WHERE guest_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE fashion_show_schedule SET show_location = 'Paris' WHERE show_date = '2023-09-15';
UPDATE event_reviews SET rating = 5, review_comment = 'Amazing show!' WHERE show_id = (SELECT show_id FROM fashion_show_schedule WHERE show_date = '2023-09-15');
UPDATE fashion_show_schedule SET show_location = 'Paris' WHERE show_id = '4c45ef3a-9a7b-4b70-bff5-7e0ad6ee56a7';
UPDATE fashion_events SET venue_location = 'New York' WHERE event_name = 'Fashion Week';
